searchConfiguration.name: Avoid mock or spy beans
searchConfiguration.description:
Mocked beans may reload the Spring context and slow your integration test.
You can find more information on this notion page : https://www.notion.so/m33/BFB-CA-R-duction-du-temps-de-CI-9fd4ef2924da401390835733c0567d54
You can remove this warning by adding : @SuppressWarnings("AllowContextReloading")
searchConfiguration.problemDescriptor: Avoid using mock or spy beans

searchConfiguration.name: DirtiesContext
Primitive type in entities
searchConfiguration.description:
No primitive type should be allowed in entities (if nullable or ID) because primitive always have a default value. You can find more information here : https://www.notion.so/m33/WeBank-Le-type-Long-n-est-pas-le-type-long-819e0da5118d4b7a9117c362572b7af2?pvs=4
Like if you use a primitive type in entity your ID will not be generated by the sequence of your database but Java will initialize it to 1.
You can remove this warning by adding : @SuppressWarnings("AllowPrimitivesInEntity")
searchConfiguration.problemDescriptor: Avoir using primitive on ID or nullable fields
